title: PGIMER Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has released an official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2026 . Here we includedthe age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last ...
